name: Sample Report 1
query: select guest_name as `Guest Name`,room_number as `Room Number`,invoice_number as `Invoice Number`,gst_number as `GST Number`,sac_code as `SAC Code`,item_name as Category,if (cgst = 6, tabItems.cgst_amount, 0) as `CGST 6`,if (cgst = 9, tabItems.cgst_amount, 0) as `CGST 9`,if (cgst = 14, tabItems.cgst_amount, 0) as `CGST 14`,if (sgst = 6, tabItems.sgst_amount, 0) as `SGST 6`,if (sgst = 9, tabItems.sgst_amount, 0) as `SGST 9`,if (sgst = 14, tabItems.sgst_amount, 0) as `SGST 14`,if (igst = 6, tabItems.igst_amount, 0) as `IGST 6`,if (igst = 9, tabItems.igst_amount, 0) as `IGST 9`,if (igst = 14, tabItems.igst_amount, 0) as `IGSt 14`,item_value as `Total Invoice`,tabItems.cgst_amount+tabItems.sgst_amount+tabItems.igst_amount as `Total Tax`,item_value_after_gst as `Total Amount` from tabInvoices JOIN tabItems ON tabInvoices.name = tabItems.parent where tabInvoices.invoice_type = "B2B" order by invoice_number,room_number;
